CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 24, 1954, pg. 13 reads: "Orchids To You! - A Trio of feminine charm walked off with orchid corsages presented to them Saturday afternoon at Kaufmann's dining room where the Alpha Wives gave a bridge party.  Orchids went to them because their hats were chosen as the pretties in the room.  Left to right: Mrs. James Stevenson, Miss Nelle Hackney of Cleveland, and Mrs. Mansfield Coles. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Alpha Wives, from left: Mrs. James Stevenson, Nelle Hackney, and Mrs. Mansfield Coles, standing in Kaufmann's dining room with leaf patterned rug and landscape painting
